entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of snow in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023
